ama.message.on_cheat_dc:
You are using %s, which is not allowed in this server.
Rejoin after disabling this feature.
ama.message.on_timeout_dc: AmaCarpet Client not found. This server requires the AmaCarpet mod to join. Please install it from Modrinth or GitHub.
ama.message.restriction.invalid: Invalid feature name! Use one of the suggested feature names.
carpet.rule.cheatRestriction.desc: Detects features specified in the config file as not allowed. Config can be modify with /restriction command. Only work in dedicated server.
carpet.rule.commandRestriction.desc: Enables /restriction command for restrict client mod features.
carpet.rule.disableAnimalSpawnOnChunkGen: Disables animal spawn on chunk generation.
carpet.rule.disableSoundEngine.desc: Disables server-side sound engine to optimize
carpet.rule.endGatewayChunkLoad.desc: When an entity passes through end gateway portal it will loaded 3x3 chunk like a nether portal
carpet.rule.endPortalChunkLoad.desc: When an entity passes through end portal it will loaded 3x3 chunk like a nether portal
carpet.rule.hopperLock.desc: Locks all of the hoppers in the world
carpet.rule.notifyLitematicShared.desc: Sends a notification to the chat when a player shared a litematic.
carpet.rule.reloadPortalTicket.desc: Reloads chunk loading tickets by nether portal on server restarts. Improves chunk loader reliability.
carpet.rule.requireAmaCarpetClient.desc: Requires AmaCarpet installed Client to join the server.(Reject all players to login without AmaCarpet).
carpet.rule.requireAmaCarpetClientTimeOu: Timeout duration for checking if the client has AmaCarpet.
